website_summaries.verdict: This fully-reclining air massage chair is great for working out knots and relieving muscle pain.
pros: Easy to set up and install
Features 20 airbags in the lower body of the chair to work on the legs, thighs, and feet
A multitude of massage therapies are included in this fully automatic chair
cons: Requires a lot of space to operate when reclining

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy massage chair from Jia Inc
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from Jia inc! They sell faulty massage chairs and don’t honor the manufacturer’s one year warranty. Buyer will have to pay out of pocket $300+ to return item. Their customer service is horrible! Don’t buy anything from them! My chair stopped working less than 2 months after assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it needs to work at lease 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It stop working. I got it 14 Feb and today is the 13 March 2019 and it stop working.I need some assistance. PLEASE!
customer_reviews.author: Consandra Bradford

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty good massage very rough and has hurt my back ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this chair. I bought this chair a few years ago. It was pretty good massage very rough and has hurt my back a few times. You need to put extra padding to be able to handle the deep pressure. I enjoyed the chair anyway and now after a few years it is not working. BTW it never had heat like it says it does. I have contacted the company a week ago and they have not returned a response. I now have a 300 pound chair in my living room that does not work and I am so disappointed that for the money I spent the company can't even respond???
customer_reviews.author: Marla  P.

customer_reviews.title: Our chair arrived defective, did not massage the shoulder ...
customer_reviews.text: Our chair arrived defective, did not massage the shoulder region even when prompted, it also did this awful clicking when placed on a certain massage type (kneading). Our parents have this same chair without issues and it does work well, when it is actually working. I had more issues with the company than I did with the chair, returning it is a nightmare, we've been trying to do so for a month and finally got the answers we wanted. The chair itself is a gamble, theirs (parents) works well, ours never worked 100% correctly. I would look into other options if possible.
customer_reviews.author: bheberling

customer_reviews.title: Some unclear instructions and difficult to move inside the house after driveway delivery
customer_reviews.text: Some instructions were unclear and there are parts that are likely used for other models that have connection points that leave you guessing. For example, the backrest pad thing has a wire that hangs out which goes nowhere for this model. Also, the chair is pretty much delivered assembled in 1 piece. You will need 2 strong persons to lift it to where you want it. Would be nice if Amazon/seller offered white gloves delivery that included setup for an extra fee.
customer_reviews.author: himanshu soni

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one in the nail salon
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pair of these as a gift to ourselves for Christmas. They are a big hit with the whole family. I do wish it was a tad bit longer. Even with the footrest fully extended, my 6'2" hubby can't straighten out fully. We are still learning all the settings. Very relaxing. Just like the one in the nail salon. Delivery was exactly as promised. Only minor assembly was required.
customer_reviews.author: Bekki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair. it was easy to put together. it works wonderfully. the only thing I did not like was it came early and no one called me to make sure I would be home. the delivery person was nice enough to put it in the garage for me, so it did not get wet. had someone called, my husband would have been home to help with the delivery. but we love the chair. we think it was a great deal. very well put together. very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsvaloc

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. They are beautiful and massage and heat are ...
customer_reviews.text: First one came damaged and got $200 from customer service and second one only one arm rest works. Very disappointed. They are beautiful and massage and heat are wonderful. Wish the second one work right, but tired of complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best chair ever...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair in 2013. It has been used every day since then, by everybody who comes by (sometimes specifically to use the chair). Some days, it's used more than 10 times, often restarted and used for over an hour continuously. I have never had one problem with this chair, it has held up beautifully. Starting to show some wear after five years of continuous use, but still functions like new. I highly reccomend this chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina W

customer_reviews.title: Great service and great massage chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair delivers. I added a little extra padding because I am bony and it did the trick. I use all of the functions and look forward to a daily massage. I suffer from back pain off and on and having a massage chair really helps. The price was good and I like the look of the chair. It doesn't look like it belongs in a space ship. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My uncle has had one for as long as I can remember and every time we'd go to their house we'd use it. So of course, when I decided to purchase a massage chair, I had to get the one model I'd already tested out. No regrets! My family of four uses it just about every day. The bonus was that arrived weeks earlier than estimated. If you are on the fence about purchasing this product from this seller, don't be. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps speed up recovery after long cycle sessions.
customer_reviews.text: Sit back stretch out and let the chair work it's magic. It doesn't do the head. It does foot, calf, outer thigh, lower back all the way up to the neck. Also works the forearms. Also has a heat function for the mid and lower back and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Y.

customer_reviews.title: awesome - best massage chair ever - can not understand ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome - best massage chair ever - can not understand how people have an issue with the assembly or the move of the item - I did it myself in 1 hour out of the box to my first massage wheeling it over edges etc. simply the best chair out there
customer_reviews.author: W. T.

customer_reviews.title: A very nice chair!
customer_reviews.text: I had recently got this for my mother for her birthday, and she loves everything about it. It has different settings from relaxation, to pain relief, all of which helps my whole family feel better physically. It's very quiet, as it works with mostly air compressed parts that expand and deflate via air tubes. My ONLY complaint is that the instruction manual is kind of hard to follow, as it wasn't written in very good English. However, it did not hinder the performance of the chair at all, and I definitely recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: The remote device has had to be replaced 3 times
customer_reviews.text: This chair works very well but it’s on it’s third partThat has had to be replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of trash!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of my money. Half the rollers went out in less than 2 months and we have sat on it maybe 6 times. If I could rate as a 0 i would. Please dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift we ever got ourselves
customer_reviews.text: Love our chair, so does the rest if the family when they come over. I am 5'2" my husband is 6' fits booth of us. Heat on the feet is great, don't really feel it on our back? This may be a error on our part.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya White

customer_reviews.title: Short people
customer_reviews.text: I am shorter than most so the positioning of the neck kneaders is too high. I also don't fit properly in the legs but I alternate upper body and lower body so it works for me
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sandra A Cooke

customer_reviews.title: The best massage chair
customer_reviews.text: I will never pay for another massage. This chair is fabulous in fact we are considering buying a second one instead of a new couch. As far as I can tell, the only significant difference between this chair and the 3-5000 chairs is that it's not real leather. I give it 10 stars. I did buy a 3 year extended warranty from SquareTrade just in case. I have read that the company that the chair comes from sucks. So I played it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great in Home Message
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy our new message chair. Very relaxing and convenient to have at home. Pressure a little intense at times, but still working on learning how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: This has been one of the greatest investments in our health and comfort
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the chair, which was delivered on time and in a very professional manner. It took I hour approx. to integrate parts. We have been enjoying the three different settings for: Pain, comfort and just relaxation. The space that takes in my living room is adequate to the characteristics of a 10x10 feet room. This has been one of the greatest investments in our health and comfort. Highly recommended for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and looks
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fantastic except after 1 1/2 years the material started to peel and the foot rest is held up with 2 screws about 1 inch long
customer_reviews.author: Gin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this massage chair a very long time ago but forgot to leave a review. Until this day, it still works and the leather is still brand new. My parents work as physical laborers so they often have pain on their bodies. The massage chair has been a great help.
customer_reviews.author: Pham D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: The massage chair was not assembled properly at the factory and I was just Noblesville to fix it.it was very difficult t return to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's really worth it, has good pressure, really comfortable, you can personalize the type of massage
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M

customer_reviews.title: You might spend too much time In it.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves it! A visitors favorite for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Andersen

customer_reviews.title: misleading
customer_reviews.text: No full body scan, very misleading. That was one of the reasons I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McVay

customer_reviews.title: Very fast shipping. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived very quickly I didn't expect it so fast. Working perfectly THank you for your service
customer_reviews.author: Aleksejs

customer_reviews.title: Its worth the $$$( if you buy from Amazon) many styles to choose from
customer_reviews.text: Feels very relaxing good nite sleep for me, good blood circulation
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Daniels Acker

customer_reviews.title: great product, not going to be as good as ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, not going to be as good as an $5,000-10,000 inada chair but gets the job done to normal chronic aches, still may need a accupressure massage or chiropractic adjustment for better management of pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mohindra Ramphal

customer_reviews.title: Great massage chair.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for your money. The only improvement it could make is that it hurts when it massages your legs. Other than that, it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing! I probably spend an hour in it a day and it has improved my back immensely! Cannot praise it high enough!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: we really like this chair..giving it 4 starts only cuz the back massage is a bit rough..but without reclining to far back its ok..otherwise this would get 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Yitzy

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly. My friends and family love it too ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this for Christmas it's now end of April and still enjoying it. Delivery was fast, easy assembly. My friends and family love it too and one ordered for himself. Best 800$ massage chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I'm thinking of buying another one at this price, 799.00 no tax and no shipping charge, what?.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it on Saturday and received it Wednesday even though it wasn't scheduled to be delivered until the following week. The chair is nothing short of amazing. My doorway is 32.5 inches wide and the box was 32.5 inches wide and fit through like a glove, literally. Shipped from Georgia? I live in suburbs of Philly. I brought it in myself by flipping it end over end.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K

customer_reviews.title: Works like the 2k+ massager for now.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered earlier than expected. So far so good. We'll see how it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: The price was the best I found. Rollers for the back and pads pretty much everywhere else. For me as good or better than the chairs in the airports. Set up takes about fifteen minutes and you are off and running.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment. Only option I wished it had was ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent investment. Only option I wished it had was rollers for the bottom of your feet. The chair was delivered timely and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Roach

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: It is great and my guests wait to enjoy what it does. It's liked so much that I bought a second chair for a Christmas gift. They couldn't wait to get it unpacked and put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair! Heat gets really hot on feet! Wish it would click into the position you need for leg length. I feel like I'm have pressure on my legs and feet during the massage because I'm taller than average. So, I tend to put legs on top of feet rest. The back massage is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this chair, it hits the right spots on his body for pain relief 👍😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I also dont like how when its done that it sits you back ...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't for short people.. It massages your head and the arm and leg part squeezes you very hard and its uncomfortable. I also dont like how when its done that it sits you back up, It will wake you up from a nap.
customer_reviews.author: curly fry

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I hop on this chair as soon as I gets home and sometimes feel asleep in it till it was bedtime. Love this chair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rom Yous

customer_reviews.title: Electric Full Body Shiatsu Massage Chair Recliner Stretched Foot Rest works well.
customer_reviews.text: Electric Full Body Shiatsu Massage Chair Recliner Stretched Foot Rest works well.
customer_reviews.author: James Bui

customer_reviews.title: ... have had the Chair for 1 year and its great.. I and Family members have tried it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Chair for 1 year and its great.. I and Family members have tried it and they also like it.. It is not used every day, But when i need it that Damn Chair is a DREAM Maker.. It does Great and it even has a Tail bone Deal which May surprise you .. It surprised me! lol ! I Recommend the Chair to anyone who is not to Tall Over 6 ft. And not real Over Weight..
customer_reviews.author: russell riles

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It’s been a week of running this thing ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It’s been a week of running this thing 5 times a day. No issues. Quality is better than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: russ whittington

customer_reviews.title: You’ll feel like a new person.
customer_reviews.text: Best chair ever!!! This chair is amazing and it looks good too. I don’t know how I got along without it. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nanben

customer_reviews.title: Really great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Really great chair!! Large...we had to take bedroom door off to get it in. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: This chair is perfect after a long hard day from work
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect after a long hard day from work. Especially if you have chronic pain, this is the best thing for it!!! Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best product I ever bought! Caution measure your doorways! It takes a full 31" doorway to come in.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this chair so glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Karen mccall

customer_reviews.title: Best massage chair investment
customer_reviews.text: I am speechless. This chair was recommended off the record by my chiropractor. The best investment for stress, pain and comfort. Shipping was expedite and professional. The chair came in a crate that was placed in my mud room. Afterwards, l unpacked the crate two pieces and set it up in the family room. I only had to place the arm pads and technology function on the chair. Great instructions and diagram. Oh my chair has a heat function and comfort levels.
customer_reviews.author: IkhlasBayyan2010

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love it!! I bought this for my husband, and I use it as much as he does! It was so easy to set up and move to our bedroom! you won't be disappointed in this chair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Ness

customer_reviews.title: Great chair first year
customer_reviews.text: Gave it five starts but if I had to complain it would be the feet heat is intense while you can never feel the lower back heat. Great chair
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased! Great chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very Pleased! Great chair for the money. Seems to be a sturdy chair. The rollers could be a little smoother in the tailbone area and a little deeper massage in the shoulders but all in all I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Callahan

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is a great chair. It was worked flawlessly and everyone loves ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great chair. It was worked flawlessly and everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Miedema Auctioneering

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: massage is nice but very vigorous, too much if you have tender condition
customer_reviews.author: Zoanne Clark

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: missing remote controller. bought this chair 5 days ago, almost impossible to get hold of the supplier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: resident seems very happy with his new chair
customer_reviews.text: Per staff, resident seems very happy with his new chair.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Afanador

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair worth the money I'm 6'4 so it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair worth the money I'm 6'4 so it's not as long as I would like but I recommend for ppl shorter 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect quality gift!!
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful chair was given as a 2013 Christmas Gift! And it was very well received. It was perfect, being used daily and loved by the recipient who raves about the quality and comfort. Very successful choice of gifts!
customer_reviews.author: hja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect massage chair, I can't believe possible to by with that price. Super quality and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: jeyan

customer_reviews.title: Dream bed
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't ask for anything better. I'm so in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN L. SWEET

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: After only a few uses I noticed a difference in how my back felt. My husband says it's the best money I ever spent. Very relaxing and perfect for meditation.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cary

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disappointing experience. The remote control stopped working and supplier distributor offered no help and no support and replacing the remote control dot. Staff was extremely rude and unhelpful. I have an expensive piece of furniture just sitting in my house doing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Mimimommy

customer_reviews.title: Electric Full Shiatsu Massage chair
customer_reviews.text: We love our chair, it is black with mahogany arm. We all take turns and enjoy. You will love this chair, be aware that this chair is heavy. I asked to have it delivered on a weekend and they called and made sure someone was home to deliver. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good so far my mother love it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Emily velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, does everything as described
customer_reviews.text: Great chair , does everything as described. Love this massage chair!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Yeah
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. The arm massages is a little tight and my wife complained that the calf massage was a little strong, but that was easily adjusted. The chair offered a variety of fixed massage options, along with a variety of customizable options. The set up was easy but fair warning the chair is heavy and you will need some help getting it into the house and out of the carton. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great value if you are 5'9 or shorter.
customer_reviews.text: I am not the tallest guy; right at six feet tall. This chair is too small for me. My legs can't extend straight and my neck is bent forward during the massage. The back of my head rests on the wood above the rollers. This gives me a forward heard posture for the massage. I've had to compromise and slide my body down, bending my knees to get my back in the right spot. It's a great value if you are 5'9.
customer_reviews.author: DrJarom

customer_reviews.title: feels good!
customer_reviews.text: Everybody in the family likes it! We always sit on it for relaxation... feels good!
customer_reviews.author: Teresita S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered earlier than expected works great best deal on the web
customer_reviews.author: david eagleson

customer_reviews.title: THIS CHAIR IS A GOOD VALUE. THE ARM COMPRESSION IS THE ONLY DRAW ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS CHAIR IS A GOOD VALUE. THE ARM COMPRESSION IS THE ONLY DRAW BACK. IF YOU HAVE SMALL ARMS IT WOULD BE OK BUT IF YOU ARE AVERAGE OR ABOVE AVERAGE IN SIZE YOU CAN ONLY GET ABOUT HALF OF YOUR FOREARM IN THE COMPRESSION ARM REST. EASY TO PUT TOGETHER MAYBE 4 PIECES. USE IT DAILY.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID W.

customer_reviews.title: Massages everything
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, works brilliantly. Very hard to not have to many massages. Not the best looking chair for a main living room, but okay for your bedroom, or home office or something like that
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is great and does the the job.. is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: mansour smaini

customer_reviews.title: It's good massage chair
customer_reviews.text: it's good. It has every thing I expect for the price I paid. The machine has heat, back, shoulder and excellent foot massage.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Tran

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price. No trip outside residence for massaging.
customer_reviews.text: It is good for price. Meeting expected performance. Design improvement required for hand massage. Blessing for seniors when no one to massage around. Quickly delivered within week. Yet to receive Invoice and warranty with proper documentation.
customer_reviews.author: Hari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, plan to buy my father one for his birthday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do have to say this is a great item and have made my mom very happy
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money but it has some limitations. My opinion is th arm function is pretty much worthless. The heat is very minimal. Your head gets a little uncomfortable when you want the function by your neck because there is no support behind it. I would recommend it if you don't want to spend a lot of money. Mine as 1035.00 in the door with 2 year warranty. Delivery is expensive cause it is so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy McKissock

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair and it is a wonderful product company was wonderful. Went out of their way to make sure i was satisfied great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the cost. Thought it would have shiatsu massagers in feet too, but it only has it in the back. The heater on the feet gets too warm so make sure you wear socks. Also the air pressure on the arms is way too much. Still trying to figure out how to let that part less intense. The massage is decent and has helped with my back pain and bc of that I get less massages with a masseuse now. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever saved an saved for! So happy I finally got it. Perfect. :))
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bowler

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't say full body massage misses upper legs and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say full body massage misses upper legs and feet only does the forearm and really not that well. Not at all what I expected doesn't adjust to size. Does an ok job on the lower and mid back nothing on shoulders and misses the upper back. I'm giving it a generous rating..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work as advertised. Control pad was faulty, causing sporadic malfunctions. There is no way to deal with a malfunctioning chair in the field, so it must be shipped back for replacement or refund. This caused me great disappointment and no small amount of aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome! I was nervous about buying it on line. Not seeing & trying it first. It is exactly what I was hoping for. Looks as good as it runs!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best chair ever !
customer_reviews.text: We looked a while to find a chair that massaged entire body. This one does so, has heat if you want it and is as gentle or as strong as you'd prefer, adjust to your preference
customer_reviews.author: B. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can amy one tell me where the back heater cord plugs into on the chair ?
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Randall

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was good, chair is great only 4* it hurts my ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was good, chair is great only 4* it hurts my lower back sooo bad other than that AWESOME SAUCE. AMAZON IS GOOD TO ME
customer_reviews.author: C. T. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Shiatsu massage chair. It looks nice and works very well. It would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: dung

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: It felt fantastic and maybe this is operator error but should my back be covered in bruises this morning? I got it last night and used it for 40 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: covers the entire body if so desired; adjustable intensity level; got it at an unbelievable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sword

customer_reviews.title: Cheap look, it looks so chinese
customer_reviews.text: I got mine today, I am not that impressed. No wonder it is cheap $1000, the finish is so cheap and feels chinese. The shiny parts made of plastic and it does not look smooth like a cheap chinese toys. The remote looks like $5 chinese remote control. The plastic mould does not look smooth; if you have a good house don't buy this you can right away see that this chair is cheapy chinese made.
customer_reviews.author: tz

customer_reviews.title: Do not get this massage chair - mine stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this massage chair - mine stopped working within 2 years - still have protection that I bought extra - that is a laugh - can't get any help - cavalier will not help me they do not stand behind their promise ! - and I paid $1200.00
customer_reviews.author: Tigerlily

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: loved the chair while it worked, but at 9 months it stopped working, and I can't seem to get it replaced through the company. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen andrus

customer_reviews.title: stopped but got it working again
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on August 31, 2016. It stopped working on September 19, 2017. Used on average 3 times per week. You get what you pay for. Edit: after about an hour troubleshooting the problem, I found the culprit. It was one of the buttons behind lid that got stuck. after I unstuck it it works like a charm again. 9/22/17
customer_reviews.author: Ly T.

customer_reviews.title: It Does It All!
customer_reviews.text: The carrier communicated really well regarding shipping. That was rather impressive. The package is understandably heavy, so make sure to have some help. The features are amazing! Wasn’t aware of the arms massage (which we love), and love the quick height adjustment feature for the legs as well. This massage chair does everything but make you a sandwich!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair..exceeded. my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I debated about buying this chair for about a year and finally my wife got it for me as a X'mas gift. I've had it almost 6 months now and I love it. In fact I'm sitting in it right now. I use it almost every day just to recline. I use massage feature about 3-4 times per week. I'm 6' 2" and I fit in it just fine. Two thumbs up. Just do it, your back will thank you later.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the money, We have had ours for several years and still works like new. Very heavy and hard to move.
customer_reviews.author: RobMckenner

customer_reviews.title: After lots of searching, I think I landed a great product
customer_reviews.text: This chair is really comfortable, attractive, and powerful. For the money, I really think this is the best chair on the market - seems very high quality, and I'm expecting many years of service. Company (Cavalier) did a great job shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Full Body Electric Shiatsu Massage Chair Recliner with Built-in Heat Therapy Air Massage System Stretch Vibrating for Home Office Living Room PS4,Black
product_meta.description:
Premier Service: In-home delivery to your room of choice, including unpacking, assembly, setup and debris removal, as required. 

Deluxe Service: In-home delivery to your room of choice, including unpacking and debris removal. *****Please read this before you buy IMPORTANT NOTE**** This item will be shipped by freight( R&L Carriers or other similar freight company), the freight company driver can not enter your house/facility, they will only delivery outside your house/facility, if you live in high rise building or apartment, they will only delivery to the building, not to your house, we need your working phone number to ship out to you, and freight shipment is in general 3 to 7 business days longer than small package shipment. Freight shipment is very expense, if you simply refused the shipment, or if they can’t get hold of you, they will send the item back to us, they will charge us the return shipping fee, if that happens, we will refund you minus the $300 shipping fee for both ways. 

Feature

☛7 Massage Modes: kneading, tapping, stretching, shiatsu, combo, air pressure, heating. 

☛Smart body scan technology scans your body to detect your body size for individual custom fit massage. 

☛There are total 21 air bags which are strategically located in the arms, hips, shoulder, thighs, calves, and feet

☛2 heating pads in back area and 2 heating pads in foot area that enhance the massage experience

☛Our chairs are built to last and it is rated to accommodate a person who is 6'3" Tall and up to 265lbs. 

☛9 preset auto massage programs have different massage methods to give you the best massage experience.Including special stretching programs for full body stretching, but you can also choose manual massage functions to control your own massage. 

☛100% tested before leaving the factory.
feature_bullets: ★【ADJUSTABLE MASSAGE CHAIR】: You can adjust the angle of the massage chair according to your needs. Speed control, width control, intensity control have 3 levels.Air massage pressure have 4 levels.Four massage points work together with other areas to provide a completely relaxing massage.Supports, neck, shoulder, waist, back, leg, and foot massage with heating（back and foot）. Your heart can work less and you can relax more.

★【AIR MASSAGE SYSTEM with HEAT THERAPY】: There are total 21 air bags which are strategically located in the arms, hips, shoulder, thighs, calves, and feet. Combined with heat therapy system(back and foot), your muscles and joints will recover faster with increased blood circulation and less pain and aches.Multiple Air bag for your hip and your waist line which inflates for compression massage to align lower back and pelvis area.

★【COMPUTERIZED BODY SCANNING】:Smart body scan technology scans your body to detect your body size for individual custom fit massage.Built-in sensor automatically measure the length of spine and knows where to massage. 11 signal tset switch and holt sensor work tegther to test user’s body height and up/down distance of massage machine for massage range.Automatically adjust massage intensity according to user’s body weight.Allow the massage chair to fit perfectly different figure.

★【FUNCTIONAL DIVERSITY】:7 Massage Modes: kneading, tapping, stretching ,shiatsu, combo,air pressure,heating .9 preset auto massage programs have different massage methods to give you the best massage experience.Including special stretching programs for full body stretching are suitable for most,but you can also choose manual massage functions to control your own massage.

★【What You Will Got】We guarantee that you will like this massage chair. If you are not satisfied with this massage chair, please contact us and we will be happy to give you a 100% refund! If you have any questions for massage chari, please feel free to ask!
